Name: Hello Pollution!
About the game: Waste disposal simulator. Operate a questionable waste disposal business. You have just started your new waste disposal company, but seems that something unusual is happening around you. Bury junk and waste without causing serious environmental disasters. Out of sight, out of mind... or is it? Features: ● Dynamic insanity ● Terrible waste management ● Physics-based puzzles ● A narrative story
